pullRequest.title: [automation] Moved constants to top and made them public for reference
pullRequest.bodyText:
Some other small code clean-ups and improvements.
These changes were done while working on #1451 and extracted as they are functionally unrelated.
Signed-off-by: Kai Kreuzer kai@openhab.org
